SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.macro.focus_choice_con: {name} is a focus spell. What type of macro would you like to create?
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_enhanc: Replace the default player sheet header with an interactive header showing HP bar, AC, abilities, luck, XP, and level
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_defaul: Use a default background image for all actor sheets that don't have a custom background set
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.default_heade: The image or video to use as the default header background when no custom background is set
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_focus_: Track active focus spells on player sheets and automatically remove effects when focus is lost or failed
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.renown_maximu: The maximum Renown value that players can achieve (default: 20)
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_npc_in: Add an Inventory tab to NPC sheets for managing items and coins
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_npc_cr: Add a Creature Type dropdown to NPC sheets (Beast, Undead, Dragon, etc.)
Adds a Party actor type for managing groups of players with shared inventory
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_renown: Add a Renown stat to player character sheets for tracking faction reputation or fame
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_tradin: Allow players to trade items and coins with each other (shows Trade button on player sheets)
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_contai: Allow items to be used as containers with nested storage, coins, and slot calculation
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_nested: When enabled, containers can be placed inside other containers. Disable to prevent nesting containers.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_uniden: Allow items to be marked as unidentified, hiding their real name and description from players
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_multis: Allow Shift+Click and Ctrl+Click to select multiple items for bulk deletion
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_torch_: Show animated flames on tokens when light sources are active (requires Sequencer and JB2A modules)
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_add_co: Add a + button to the Coins section for quickly adding or removing coins
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_journa: Replace the simple Notes tab with a multi-page journal system for player characters

SDX.Settings.AAIntegration.Name: Automated Animations Integration
SDX.Settings.AAIntegration.Hint: Enable custom integration with Automated Animations module to play animations only on successful attacks/spells (requires reload)
SDX.Settings.AAAnimateOnSuccess.Name: Animate Only On Success
SDX.Settings.AAAnimateOnSuccess.Hint: Only play animations when attacks hit or spells succeed. Critical failures will never animate.
SDX.Settings.AAAnimateSpellsWithoutTarge: Play animations for spells that don't have a target DC (e.g., utility spells)
Show floating damage (red) and healing (green) numbers above tokens when HP changes

SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.hp_waves.enable_hint: Show animated waves on character portraits that rise as HP decreases
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.hp_waves.default_color: The default color for HP waves when no ancestry match is found
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.hp_waves.ancestry_colo: Set custom wave colors for specific ancestries. The ancestry name must match exactly (case-insensitive).

SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.hp_waves.reset_complet: HP wave settings reset to defaults

SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.SDXROLLS.settings.succ: The sound to play when the roll is successful
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.SDXROLLS.settings.fail: The sound to play when the roll is a failure
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.SDXROLLS.settings.reca: Configure who can see the message displayed once the Sdx Roll is complete
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.SDXROLLS.settings.clea: Delete the roll messages after the Sdx Roll is complete
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.SDXROLLS.settings.bann: The color of the banner behind the Sdx Roll animation
Optional custom image for the banner background (leave empty to use color)

SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.SDXROLLS.getRollData.a: Allow players to reroll their roll
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.SDXROLLS.getRollData.b: Hide the results of the rolls from players

SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_carous: Add a Carousing tab to player character sheets for tracking downtime activities
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.title: Carousing
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.only_players: Only Player characters can be dropped here
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.session_comp: Carousing session complete! Check chat for results.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.no_tier_sele: Please select a carousing tier first
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.some_cannot_: Some participants cannot afford this tier
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.total_bonus_: Total carousing roll bonus (Tier Bonus + Renown)
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.open_overlay: Click to open the full-screen carousing overlay where you can join a carousing session.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.select_chara: Select a character to use for carousing:
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.no_owned_cha: You don't own any player characters
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.tier_0: A worthy night of drinking and festivity
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.tier_1: A full day and night of revelry, gambling, and recounting your exploits
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.tier_2: Two days of crawling dozens of taverns to sing, buy rounds, and celebrate
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.tier_3: A three-day voyage into the finest food, drink, and gambling you can find
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.tier_4: A hazy, weeklong bender that runs multiple well-known taverns dry
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.tier_5: A spirited fete lasting ten days that attracts hordes of revelers
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.tier_6: Two legendary weeks of drinking and debauchery widespread enough to take over a whole city
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_1: You wake up blearily in your bed.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_2: You're locked in the stocks for 1d4 days and fined 20% of your total wealth for setting a building on fire.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_3: You wake up in a gutter with 15% of your total wealth spent.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_4: You hazily remember donating 10% of your total wealth to a glib priest.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_5: You're fined 10% of your total wealth for starting a full-tavern brawl.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_6: The Thieves' Guild bilked you for 5% of your total wealth.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_7: You led an entire tavern in a wildly insulting song about a disliked noble.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_8: You survived a blindfolded knife-throwing demonstration unscathed.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_9: By talent (50%) or trickery (50%), you beat a rival crawler in a test of skill.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_10: An angry wizard cast a deadly spell at you, but you reflected it off your cup.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_11: You performed a humiliating prank on a despised and corrupt merchant.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_12: You defeated a noble in a highly wagered drinking contest.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_13: You pulled off an ill-advised heist inside a feared sorcerer's tower.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.outcome_14: You wake up deep inside the local ruler's stronghold holding one of their priceless family heirlooms. Footsteps approach.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.delete_table: Are you sure you want to delete the table "{name}"?
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.no_custom_ta: No custom tables created yet. Click 'New Table' to create one.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.manage_table: Open the editor to create custom carousing tables
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.carousing_mod: Choose between Original (d8 simple) and Expanded (d8 + d100 benefits/mishaps) carousing rules.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.carousing_sho: If disabled, players will see the roll result but not the benefit description text in carousing chat messages.
If disabled, players will see the roll result but not the mishap description text in carousing chat messages.
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.manage_expan: Edit the Expanded Carousing mode tables (tiers, outcomes, benefits, mishaps)

SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.carousing.import_error: Failed to import table. Please check the file format.

SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.weaponAnimation.noImag: No weapon images found in assets/Weapons folder
SHADOWDARK_EXTRAS.settings.enable_weapon: Show equipped weapon images on tokens (requires Sequencer module)
